## Type of Change

- [ ] `feat` — New feature
- [ ] `fix` — Bug fix
- [ ] `refactor` — Code restructuring (no behavior change)
- [ ] `test` — Adding or updating tests
- [ ] `docs` — Documentation only
- [ ] `chore` — Build, CI, or tooling changes

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests written (TDD: red → green → refactor)
- [ ] All tests pass (`pnpm test` / `./mvnw test`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`pnpm lint`)
- [ ] Format check passes (`pnpm format:check`)
- [ ] No `any` types introduced
- [ ] RxDB schema updated (if data model changed)
- [ ] Flyway migration added (if database changed)
- [ ] Soft deletes used (no hard deletes)
- [ ] API keys kept server-side only
- [ ] Offline behavior verified
- [ ] Commit messages follow Conventional Commits
